Cover Art
 Neo Maya
 Raúl Cruz, was born in Mexico City, and even as a kid he liked to draw sci-fi illustrations. Due to the lack of concept or sci-fi art schools in Mexico, he continued developing his skills on his own. He currently works as illustrator and model-maker for advertising agencies and publishers.
